USER QUERY: When any of the three ceiling keypad dimmers (4D 32 B8 5, 4D 32 B8 6, 4D 32 B8 7) is physically fast-on (DFON) during night hours (22:00 to 06:00), dim their backlight to a low setting so it doesn't blind us.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Night fast-on sets keypad backlight low",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When any keypad receives a physical Fast On (DFON) during night, set backlight low on all three keypads.",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "4D 32 B8 5", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "4D 32 B8 6", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "4D 32 B8 7", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "from": { "time": "22:00", "to": { "time": "06:00", "day": 1 } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "4D 32 B8 5", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "4D 32 B8 6", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "4D 32 B8 7", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 16, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Use COC (DFON) triggers for any of the three devices combined with a night time window. Action uses the BL accept command (uom 25) available on each device to reduce backlight to a low index (16). All device commands used are present in each device's Accept Commands."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
